text: Walter Lee Zachary, Jr. (born December 18, 1946) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/149850/walter-zachary- jr#.VWvaEGTBzGc He represents the 73rd district. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:21st- century American politicians Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:People from Yadkinville, North Carolina Category:1946 births
title: Lee Zachary
